VXI/VME Settings:Source Access Privilege

Short name: Src Access Priv

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME RBD Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI/VME MemAcc

Specifies the address modifier to use in high-level access operations, such as VISA In X and VISA Move In X, when reading from the source. The default is Data/Privileged (0).

Values

0 Data/Privileged
1 Data/NonPrivileged
2 Program/Privileged
3 Program/NonPrivileged
4 Block/Privileged
5 Block/NonPrivileged
6 D64/Privileged
7 D64/NonPrivileged

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read/Write
